job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
     * Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
     * Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
     * Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
     * Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
     * Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Pipeline Engineer/Head of Pipeline

* In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
     * Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
     * Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
     * Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
     * Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
     * Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on creative tooling, rendering technology, and artist collaboration, rather than core AI/ML model development or deployment. While it mentions 'pipeline' and 'automation', it lacks specific AI/ML tasks or technologies, making it lean towards traditional software engineering or technical art roles.

phrases: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
define the future architecture of our technology platform
identify shared (technical) approaches
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the business goals (next version of rendering technology), align technical direction (architecture), and collaborate with various teams to achieve shared objectives.

phrases: develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software)
Guiding and make pipeline technology choices
define the future architecture of our technology platform
Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need
Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline
implement directly
job_tasks.justification: The description involves developing software (rendering technology, end-user software, tools, automation), making technology choices, defining architecture, and building, testing, and deploying changes, which are core software development activities.

phrases: run the next version of our rendering technology
Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'run', 'build', 'test', and 'deploy' for the pipeline and technology suggests operational aspects, though without specific AI/ML model context, it's a general form of operations engineering.

phrases: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams
Collaborating with our artists
soft_skills.justification: The job explicitly emphasizes working closely with multiple teams (CTO, technical, artistic, development) and artists.

phrases: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
define the future architecture of our technology platform
soft_skills.justification: The role involves defining and developing future versions and architectures, implying a need to adapt to evolving technologies and requirements.

phrases: define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
Guiding and make pipeline technology choices
identify shared (technical) approaches
develop the tools and automation they need
Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline
soft_skills.justification: The role requires making technology choices, identifying solutions for artists' needs, and building/deploying pipeline updates, indicating a problem-solving and practical approach.

phrases: Lead Pipeline Engineer/Head of Pipeline
define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
Guiding and make pipeline technology choices
define the future architecture of our technology platform
Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline
Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly
soft_skills.justification: The 'Lead' and 'Head' titles, along with responsibilities for defining technology, architecture, and implementing changes, suggest a high degree of ownership and initiative.
